Production: Walt Disney Pictures, Jim Henson Productions
Plot: A retelling of the classic Dickens tale of Ebenezer Scrooge, miser extraordinaire. He is held accountable for his dastardly ways during night-time visitations by the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present, and future.
Title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
Actors: Michael Caine, Dave Goelz, The Great Gonzo, Steve Whitmire
